sql_blocks.name: delta_inventory_create
sql_blocks.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS delta_inventory USING delta LOCATION's3a://my-bucket/delta/inventory/'

sql_blocks.name: delta_inventory_merge
sql_blocks.sql: MERGE INTO delta_inventory t USING inv_updates s ON t.sku = s.sku AND t.warehouse = s.warehouse WHEN MATCHED AND s.updated_at >= t.updated_at THEN UPDATE SET t.on_hand = s.on_hand, t.updated_at = s.updated_at WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (sku, warehouse, on_hand, updated_at) VALUES (s.sku, s.warehouse, s.on_hand, s.updated_at)
